title: Spending More Often—That’s the Ticket for Some Payments Stocks
sub_head: How often people swipe might matter more than how much they are buying
body:
Americans have been spending money during the pandemic, just less frequently. That might seem like a fine distinction, but it matters for some payments companies.
There are two big components in payments trends: How much is spent—volume—and how many times money changes hands—transactions. The same volume across fewer transactions can result in larger tickets, in industry lingo.
